sentences.sContent: The advantages of this deal largely outweigh the disadvantages.
sentences.sCn: 这笔交易的利远大于弊。

sentences.sContent: ...argues that the social and economic benefits of using untreated human waste to grow food outweigh the health risks...
...They typically carry financial burdens that outweigh those of their peers...
...but the costs to the schools could outweigh their benefits...
...Even a few negative effects could be so large that they outweigh many positive effects...

synos.tran: 比…重（在重量上）；比…重要；比…有价值

trans.tranOther: If one thing outweighs another, the first thing is of greater importance, benefit, or significance than the second thing
